name: Forgotten Lectures - Fall of a Dynasty - The Beginning
name_original: Forgotten Lectures - Fall of a Dynasty - The Beginning
description:
Humanity went out to the stars and conquered a significant portion of the known galaxy. While technology advanced society did not necessarily. Greed, the struggle for power and influence is stronger than ever before and while besieged from outside forces there’s no lack of internal strife.

Follow the story of a young noble who is destined to marry the future ruler of the Empire…

if he manages to stay alive

Meet new friends and enemies. Discover new places and find your own position on the board of an intergalactic struggle for power.


Find out who you can trust and build up relationships. See if you can manage to live long enough to rule the galaxy one day.

You will take over as a young noble and discover a new world.
Visit different places and people and learn about the world around you and the state of the Empire.


But be careful, some of your decisions might have serious consequences for your future!


This game is a western style visual novel where you are lead through the story of the main character and are able to make decissions over time by visiting different places, responding differently in dialoges to influence the ending.
